Word_Entry.question: We need Bilog to hit red enemies
Word_Entry.notes: It looks like the shape of a ball right?
Word_Entry.hint: Bilog - Circle. It is round and has no edges. It also puts a shield around us. Cool!

Word_Entry.question: We just need a Parisukat to shoot one bullet at him
Word_Entry.notes: It looks like a door too.
Word_Entry.hint: Parsukat - A rectangle! It looks like a long box. It releases a sword. Why does this ship have a sword?

Word_Entry.question: We need Bituin to hit a lot of enemies
Word_Entry.notes: I wonder if a star really looks like this.
Word_Entry.hint: Bituin - A star shape! Teachers gives us these when we do well. It fires fire. Hahaha!

Word_Entry.question: We need Tatsulok that hits 3 enemies
Word_Entry.notes: MMM I'd like a slice of pizza right about now.
Word_Entry.hint: Tatsulok - A triangle. It has 3 sides. Oh and it shoots lasers.

Word_Entry.question: We need Krus to shoot in a wide area
Word_Entry.notes: MMM I'd like a slice of pizza right about now.
Word_Entry.hint: Krus - It looks like the letter t!

Word_Entry.question: We need the Diamante button to shield ourselves
Word_Entry.notes: I wonder if diamonds really looks like these
Word_Entry.hint: Diamante - It's like a square standing on its edge.

Word_Entry.question: We need Parihaba that shoots from the side
Word_Entry.hint: Parihaba - It looks like a long box.

Word_Entry.question: We need Tunod to that can shoot 3 at the same time
Word_Entry.notes: It’s like a triangle and a rectangle put together.
Word_Entry.hint: Tunod - An arrow. It looks like it's pointing to something.

Word_Entry.question: The gasuklay button can reach that
Word_Entry.notes: It looks like the moon sometimes too.
Word_Entry.hint: Gasuklay - Looks like a banana or a fingernail./

Word_Entry.question: Push the puso button to heal!
Word_Entry.notes: A common shape during Valentines Day
Word_Entry.hint: A heart - It's such a LOVELY shape./
